product_name: Dale of Norway Merino Baselayer Crew Neck Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A great next-to-skin layer, the Dale of Norway Merino Baselayer crew neck women's top features soft merino wool to keep you cozy during long days on the slopes. Lightweight merino wool insulates while remaining naturally breathable and odor-resistant; wool continues to insulate even when wet. Off-shoulder seams reduce chafing and irritation. Athletic fit hugs the body. Machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: A great next-to-skin layer, the Dale of Norway Merino Baselayer crew neck women's top features soft merino wool to keep you cozy during long days on the slopes.
